Player headshot sound effect is way too loud and needs a slider for the volume.
Agent voice lines need to be able to be turned off or a slider for the volume.

I love cs, been playing it since 1.6. But I just cannot recommend counter-strike. If you need to read a review to decide to play CS:GO, dont. you will need 1,000hours+ to even be able to shoot properly, the spray pattern means ur bullets go where your crosshair isnt, (counter-intuitive) csgo processes mouse inputs differently, so your aim isnt transferable without loads of practise, and theres too much to learn to have fun. i cannot recommend cs to new players. go play cod, or some random fps, you will enjoy yourself 1000x more.
